ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup creme de menthe liqueur

cookingTips: Process cookies finely and toss with melted butter to ensure even distribution and no dry spots in crust
Chill crust for 15 minutes before filling to prevent sogginess
Whip cream to stiff peaks and fold gently into marshmallow mixture to maintain airy texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through this retro no-bake classic with its distinctive pale green appearance and refreshing mint-chocolate flavor profile.
